markdownRemark.html:
I did not write anything in the past 10 days, it is due to craving for knowledge in a number of disciplines.

I used to think that I know everything but the funny thing that I was puzzled for months was I still suffer from a lot of my decisions. It just dawned to me that I haven’t scratched an inch of the universe’s potential.

Now I’m deep diving on everything about the environment. I’m studying Global Sustainability Management at the Technical University of Denmark. I’m building skills for the future. I’m 40% done already and hopefully finish it before I get a job overseas.
